ygData.subject: Still Alive...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, just wanted you to know I m still alive. Been REALLY sick the last few days with some stomach thing. I managed to come into work tonight against
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all, just wanted you to know I'm still alive. Been
REALLY sick the last few days with some stomach thing.
I managed to come into work tonight against everyone
elses judgement (they dont need to pay the rent). SO
here I am...

OH, for those interested in Dance/Trance music Ive
compiled a list of music heard in the last 13 episodes
of QAF. So if you heard a song you liked but didnt
know who performed it or the title, heres what you've
been looking for.

HUGS!

Sandy (Gaiwan/Saylem/Gotham)
---------------------------------------------------

Queer as Folk (North American Remake) Songs per
episode...

[CD rumoured to be due out late 2001]
[An 80min Megamix of Ep1-6 can be heard online here
courtesy of Jason - *temporarily down pending
copyright clearance]
Episode 1:
01. Spunk - Greek Buck [Opening Credits; picture to
right]
*02. Can You Feel It? - The Tamperer featuring Maya
[Intro Night Club]
*03. Let's Hear It for the Boy - Katty B [80's Night
in the club]
*04. Synasthesia - Junkie XL [Time to find Brian]
*05. Deeper Love - Ruff Driverz [Justin on Liberty
Ave.]
*06. Sandstorm - Darude [Brian exist clubs; spots
Justin]
*07. You Think You're a Man - Full Frontal [Brian and
Justin in apartment]
*08. Proud - Heather Small [Michael and Brian on roof
ledge]
*09. X-hale Slowly - Bootsy McQueen [Guys leaving
hospital]
*10. So Good - The Aloof [Brian and Justin in bed]
*11. Heavy Scene - Meg Lee Chin [Taking Justin to
school]
*12. More Effeminate Than You - Robin Black [Brian and
Michael in jeep]
13. Spunk - Greek Buck [End of Episode 1]

Episode 2:
01. Freefall (Nettwerk Records) - Tom Third [Justin in
the locker room]
02. I Wanna Mmm - The Lawyer [Brian and client in
bathroom]
03. Turn it Around - Courtesy of MasterSource [Working
out]
04. Louisiette - Prairie Oyster [Michael enters sports
bar]
05. Liar Song - Michael Chase [Michael talks football]
06. Think - Karaoke [Emmett sings]
07. Mambo Lupita - Peer Music [Brian tells Swayze
story]
08. Dancin' (Like it's the last day of my life) - Mike
Drury [Michael and Justin]
09. Minimal Peach - Greek Buck [Michael in old room]
10. Sleep - The Dandy Warhols [Brian and Justin by
car]
11. Dive In The Pool - Barry Harris featuring Pepper
Masi [End Credits]

Episode 3:
01. Spunk - Greek Buck [Opening Credits]

[At the gym]

06. Superstar - Novy vs. Eniac [Brian sees Mr.E again]
07. Banana - Pod [Brian loses Mr. E/Tracy spots

08. Go 48 (Bass Mix) - DJ Matt C [Vic lends Justin his

10. Dive In The Pool - Barry Harris [Brian & Michael

11. Bingo Bango - Basement Jaxx [Ted in Babylon]
12. Here's A Little Something - Joe Quaranto [Emmett
finds Katsuo]
13. The Only Way Is Up - The Kinky Boyz [Emmett, Brian

15. Let's Hear It For The Boy - Katty B. [Justin
enters the dance floor]
16. Dive In The Pool - Barry Harris [End Credits]

Episode 4:
01. Digga Digga Daa - Erotimania [Boys at Liberty

10. He's All I Want - Angel Moon [Brian's Apt. - Brian

End Credits]
